actions.committee: Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To establish a Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission.
short_title: Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission Act of 2001
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission Act of 2001 - Establishes in the legislative branch a Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission to make specific recommendations to Congress for reform of the social security system.

titles.title: Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission Act of 2001
To establish a Bipartisan Social Security Reform and Results Commission.
